      Parameters:

    • sendSearchGameRequest

      private static void sendSearchGameRequest(String gameRule, int numPlayers, javafx.scene.control.Label outNotify)
      Sends a request to the server asking to join a lobby.
      Parameters:
      gameRule - The specified game rules.
      numPlayers - The desired number of players
      outNotify - The Label which will display that a game is been looked for

    • showLobbyScreen

      public static void showLobbyScreen(LobbyBean data, int userSlot, boolean startGameError, boolean leavingLobbyError)
      Displays the lobby screen, allowing the player to set himself as ready and or start the game (if host).
      Parameters:
      data - The Bean containing all relevant information about the lobby
      userSlot - The index of the user in the Players' list
      startGameError - true if a game previously failed to start
      leavingLobbyError - true if a previous attempt to leave the lobby failed

    • readyHandle

      private static void readyHandle(boolean selected)
      Sends a message to the server, notifying the user's ready status.
      Parameters:
      selected - true if the user is ready to start

    • showTowerColorSelection

      public static void showTowerColorSelection(GameInitBean data, boolean colorSelectionError)
      Displays the Tower selection screen.
      Parameters:
      data - The Bean containing the available and non-available Towers
      colorSelectionError - true if the previous attempt to select a Tower failed

    • showWizardSelection

      public static void showWizardSelection(GameInitBean data, boolean wizardSelectingError)
      Parameters:
      data - The Bean containing all available and non-available Wizards.
      wizardSelectingError - true if a previous attempt to select a Wizard failed

    • showGameInterface

      public static void showGameInterface(VirtualViewBean data, GameToolBoxContainer eventHandlerContainer, int user)
      Displays the game interface
      Parameters:
      data - The Bean containing all the relevant information about the game
      eventHandlerContainer - The object containing the non-constant actions to respond to the player input
      user - The index of the user in the Player list

    • getBoardSlots

      private static List<Coord> getBoardSlots(int amount)
      Returns the slot available for the desired number of player.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of slots needed for all players
      Returns:
      The list containing all available slots

    • getBoardRotation

      private static List<Integer> getBoardRotation(int total)
      Returns the orientations of the boards for the desired number of player
      Parameters:
      total - The amount of slots needed for all players
      Returns:
      The list containing all available orientations

    • getIslandGroupSlots

      private static List<Coord> getIslandGroupSlots(int amount, double semiWidth, double semiHeight, Coord centerPos)
      Returns the slots in which the island groups shall be drawn.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of islands groups to draw
      semiWidth - The semi-width which the island group slot will extend to
      semiHeight - The semi-height which the island group slot will extend to
      centerPos - The center of the ideal shape containing all island groups
      Returns:
      The list containing all available slot to draw the islands group

    • getIslandGroupY

      private static double getIslandGroupY(double x, double semiWidth, double semiHeight)
      Gets the y position of an island group given its x position and the dimensions of the ideal shape containing all of them.
      Parameters:
      x - the x position of the island group
      semiWidth - The semi-width of the ideal shape containing all island groups
      semiHeight - The semi-height of the ideal shape containing all island groups
      Returns:
      The y position of the island group

    • getCloudsSlots

      private static List<Coord> getCloudsSlots(int amount, Coord center)
      Returns the slots for the desired number of clouds.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of clouds to draw
      center - The center of the ideal shape containing all the clouds
      Returns:
      The list of all slots available to draw the clouds

    • setMaxRequirement

      public static void setMaxRequirement(int islandsRequired, int studentsOnCardRequired, int studentsAtEntranceRequired, int colorsRequired)
      Sets the Character Card selection requirements
      Parameters:
      islandsRequired - The number of islands required.
      studentsOnCardRequired - The number of students on card required.
      studentsAtEntranceRequired - The number of students at entrance required.
      colorsRequired - The number of colors required.

      public static void setInitialConnector(InitialConnector initialConnector)
      Sets the initial connector.
      Parameters:
      initialConnector - The connector that will be used to log in

      public static void setDefaultSender(ClientSender defaultSender)
      Sets the defaultSender property.
      Parameters:
      defaultSender - The default sender assigned to the GUI

    • areCharacterCardRequirementsInSelection

      public static boolean areCharacterCardRequirementsInSelection()
      Checks if the user is selecting the requirements for a Character Card activation.
      Returns:
      true if requirements are in selection
